mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin( admin_id, admin_pw, admin_position_no, admin_name, member_level, create_date, update_date )VALUES ( #{adminId}, #{adminPw}, #{adminPositionNo}, #{adminName}, '3', NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.admin_id, a.admin_name, ap.admin_position, ap.admin_level, a.update_date FROM admin AS a LEFT JOIN admin_position AS ap ON a.admin_position_no = ap.admin_position_no WHERE a.admin_id =#{adminId}
